message: I'm feeling generous, but time is money! Let's make a deal.
I'll meet you halfway on your generosity
This is my final offer, take it or leave it. The clock is ticking!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Okay, Alice, let's be real. I'm taking a hit from inflation, and this is the most equitable deal we're going to get.  50/50, take it or leave it.
Equitable? You're still getting a better deal than I am, considering inflation
